ygData.msgSnippet: admin.war does not include heritrix jars. Its just a bundling of the jsps used by the UI (Hence the ClassNotFoundExceptions).  Try the heritrix.war thats up on

admin.war does not include heritrix jars. Its just a bundling of the 
jsps used by the UI (Hence the ClassNotFoundExceptions).  Try the 
heritrix.war thats up on our  continuous build server.  Its a war 
packaging of all of Heritrix: 
http://crawltools.archive.org:8080/cruisecontrol/buildresults/HEAD-heritrix 
(See under the 'Build Artifacts' link).  I haven't tried it in a while 
so it may be broken by recent refactorings but you'll likely have better 
luck deploying this in your weblogic.  Let us know how it goes.
Yours,
St.Ack
